com.wikitude.tracker

Class ImageTrackerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTrackerConfiguration

  • public final class ImageTrackerConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration class for Image Trackers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension
      ImageRecognitionRangeExtension defines if ImageTracker should use an optimized algorithm to detect target images in greater distance to the camera.
      Extending the recognition range requires HD camera frames processing and therefore needs more CPU power than the default recognition range.

      Extending the recognition distance requires more computational power of the CPU.

      • getImageRecognitionRangeExtension

        public ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension getImageRecognitionRangeExtension()
        Returns the ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension that should be used when target image recognition is active.
        Returns:
        imageRecognitionRangeExtension ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension used for image recognition.

      • setImageRecognitionRangeExtension

        public void setImageRecognitionRangeExtension(ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension imageRecognitionRangeExtension)
        Sets the ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension that should be used when target image recognition is active. Setting this property to ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension.ON on 32 bit devices will work but slow down computer vision algorithms performance noticeably. This is ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension.AUTO by default.
        Parameters:
        imageRecognitionRangeExtension - ImageTrackerConfiguration.ImageRecognitionRangeExtension used for image recognition.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If imageRecognitionRangeExtension is null.

      • getMaximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets

        public int getMaximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets()
        Returns the maximum number of targets that can be tracked concurrently.
        Returns:
        The maximum number of targets that can be tracked concurrently.

      • setMaximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets

        public void setMaximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets(int maximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets)
        Sets the maximum number of targets that can be tracked concurrently.
        This value is 1 by default and may only be set to more than 1.

        Note it takes more processing power to recognize a target than it takes to track it. Because of that, even though the maximum number can be arbitrarily high, it should be set to the expected maximum number of targets. This would lead to less processing power needed once the maximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets are tracked.
        Parameters:
        maximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets - The maximum number of targets that can be tracked concurrently.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the maximumNumberOfConcurrentlyTrackableTargets is less than 1.

      • getDistanceChangedThreshold

        public int getDistanceChangedThreshold()
        Returns the threshold the distance between targets has to exceed in order for ImageTarget.OnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener.onDistanceBetweenTargetsChanged(int, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget) to be triggered.
        Returns:
        Threshold to trigger ImageTarget.OnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener.onDistanceBetweenTargetsChanged(int, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget).
        See Also:
        ImageTarget.OnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener, ImageTarget.setOnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener(com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget.OnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener)

      • setDistanceChangedThreshold

        public void setDistanceChangedThreshold(int distanceChangedThreshold)
        Sets the threshold the distance between targets has to exceed in order for ImageTarget.OnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener.onDistanceBetweenTargetsChanged(int, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget) to be triggered.
        Parameters:
        distanceChangedThreshold - Threshold to trigger ImageTarget.OnDistanceBetweenTargetsListener.onDistanceBetweenTargetsChanged(int, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget, com.wikitude.tracker.ImageTarget).
        Throws:

        See Also:
